summary: Adds a big Khajiit follower equipped with a Unique Armor that can be found inside the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=papyrus]Requires Dawnguard & Skyrim 1.9.32 or higher[/font][/size][/center]
[center][font=papyrus][size=4]Check out my other mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/179291]HERE[/url][/size][/font][/center]
===============
INTRODUCTION:
===============
- Yushin is a follower i made a few months ago along with his armor
- He is 2 or 3 foot taller than a normal Khajiit, or maybe the tallest NPC in Skyrim
- Specializes in close quarter combat
- Has his own unique gears
- Yushin Armor Set (Male Only) can be crafted at a Forge
- I recommend Retextures for Vampire Royal Armor & Ebony Armor :)

===============
ABOUT:
===============
- Race: Khajiit
- Gender: Male
- Combat Style: Barbarian (2H)
- Favorite Weapon: Greatswords
- Clothing: Yushin Armor Set

===============
WHERE CAN I FIND HIM??:
===============
- Inside the Bannered Mare in Whiterun

===============
INSTALLATION & UNINSTALLATION:
===============
I recommend installing using NMM since it lets you easily install & uninstall mods
author: Loshirai14
